title: Missing required data: {quarkus.maven-plugin.version} on project bootstrapping
body:
### Describe the bug

Bootstrap a new project following the guide: https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started

```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.16.3.Final:create \
    -DprojectGroupId=org.acme \
    -DprojectArtifactId=getting-started \
    -Dextensions='resteasy-reactive'
```

### Expected behavior

project is generated successfully, as it used to

### Actual behavior

maven fails with: 

```log
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  1.864 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2023-03-03T07:24:36+01:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.16.3.Final:create (default-cli) on project standalone-pom: Failed to generate Quarkus project: Error while rendering template: /codestarts/quarkus/buildtool/maven/base/pom.tpl.qute.xml: Missing required data: {quarkus.maven-plugin.version} -> [Help 1]
```

### How to Reproduce?

see above

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

Java version: 17.0.6, vendor: Homebrew, runtime: /usr/local/Cellar/openjdk@17/17.0.6/libexec/openjdk.jdk/Contents/Home


### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev
